post.summary: Creates or updates the specified property.
post.description: If property.IsNew == True, a new property is created. It's updated otherwise

parameters.name: doDeleteValues
parameters.description: Flag indicating to remove property values from objects as well

schema.description: Flag indicating to remove property values from objects as well

post.summary: Creates or updates the specified property dictionary items

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The identifiers of objects that needed to be deleted

typeId.description: Gets or sets the asset type identifier.

group.description: Gets or sets the asset group name.

name.description: Gets or sets the asset name.

languageCode.description: Gets or sets the asset language.

isInherited.description: System flag used to mark that object was inherited from other

type.description: Association type (Accessories, Up-Sales, Cross-Sales, Related etc)

itemId.description: Is a primary key of associating object

associatedObjectId.description:
Each link element can have an associated object like Product, Category, etc.
Is a primary key of associated object

entryId.description: Entry identifier which this link belongs to

listEntryType.description: Gets or sets the type of the list entry. E.g. "product", "category"

priority.description: Product order position in virtual catalog

seoInfos.description: All SEO records for the object

hasVirtualParent.description: True when this object is linked to the virtual parent.

OutlineItem.description: Represents one outline element: catalog, category or product.

Outline.description:
Represents the path from the catalog to one of the child objects (product or category):
catalog/parent-category1/.../parent-categoryN/object

outline.description: Category outline in physical catalog (all parent categories ids concatenated. E.g. (1/21/344))

path.description: Category path in physical catalog (all parent categories names concatenated. E.g. (parent1/parent2))

isInherited.description: System flag used to mark that object was inherited from other

charCountMin.description: Down chars count border or null if no defined

charCountMax.description: Upper chars count border or null if no defined

isReadOnly.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether user can change property value.

isManageable.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether user can change property metadata or remove this property.

isNew.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is new. A new property should be created on server site instead of trying to update it.

catalogId.description: Gets or sets the catalog id that this product belongs to.

categoryId.description: Gets or sets the category id that this product belongs to.

hidden.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this VirtoCommerce.CatalogModule.Core.Model.Property is hidden.

classTypes.description: Gets or sets the class types.

withHidden.description: Specifies if we search for hidden products.

startDate.description: Gets or sets the start date. The date must be in UTC format as that is format indexes are stored in.

startDateFrom.description: Gets or sets the start date from filter. Used for filtering new products. The date must be in UTC format as that is format indexes are stored in.

endDate.description: Gets or sets the end date. The date must be in UTC format as that is format indexes are stored in.

includeAggregations.description: Gets or sets a "white" list of aggregation keys that identify preconfigured aggregations, which SHOULD be calculated and returned with the search result.

excludeAggregations.description: Gets or sets a "black" list of aggregation keys that identify preconfigured aggregations, which SHOULD NOT be calculated and returned with the search result.

sortInfos.description: Override base SortInfo property to support GeoSortInfo sorting types

outline.description: CategoryId1/CategoryId2, no catalog should be included in the outline

outlines.description: CategoryId1/CategoryId2, no catalog should be included in the outline

userGroups.description: Assigned groups for current user. Data format: user_groups:value1,value2

isFuzzySearch.description: Enable fuzzy search, i.e. allow to search color:white even if color:wihte actually passed to criteria

rawQuery.description: Gets or sets the search provider specific raw search query; all other search criteria will be ignored

includeFields.description: Allows to retrieve only a specific set of fields in the result hits

typeId.description: Gets or sets the asset type identifier.

group.description: Gets or sets the asset group name.

name.description: Gets or sets the asset name.

languageCode.description: Gets or sets the asset language.

isInherited.description: System flag used to mark that object was inherited from other

gtin.description: Global Trade Item Number (GTIN). These identifiers include UPC (in North America), EAN (in Europe), JAN (in Japan), and ISBN (for books).

outline.description: Product outline in physical catalog (all parent categories ids concatenated. E.g. (1/21/344))

path.description: Product path in physical catalog (all parent categories names concatenated. E.g. (parent1/parent2))

productType.description: Can be Physical, Digital or Subscription.

imgSrc.description: Gets the default image for the product.

seoObjectType.description: Each descendant type should override this property to use other object type for seo records
